com.varmateo.yawg.html

Class HtmlPageBaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.varmateo.yawg.html.HtmlPageBaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PageBaker

    public final class HtmlPageBaker
extends Object
implements PageBaker
    A Baker that transforms HTML files into other HTML files.

      • isBakeable

        public boolean isBakeable(Path path)
        Checks if the given file name has one of the known extensions.

        The following extensions will be allowed:

        • .adoc
        Specified by:
        isBakeable in interface PageBaker
        Returns:
        True if the given file name has one of the allowed extensions.

      • bake

        public void bake(Path sourcePath,
                 PageContext context,
                 Path targetDir)
          throws YawgException
        Converts the given text file in HTML format into another HTML file processed through the template engine.

        The target directory must already exist. Otherwise an exception will be thrown.

        Specified by:
        bake in interface PageBaker
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - The file to be baked.
        context - Provides the template for generating the target document. If no template is provided, then the source document is just copied to the target directory.
        targetDir - The directory where the baked file will be copied to.
        Throws:
        YawgException - Thrown if the baking failed for whatever reason.
